notes: Would not launch without any tweaks.
title: SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 570 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.6-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Game runs, but the launcher doesn't. Open game files, rename SHMCD.exe to SUPERHOTMCD.exe and rename SHMCD_Data to SUPERHOTMCD_Data and it starts.
title: SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE

notes: After renaming SHMCD.exe to SUPERHOTMCD.exe and SHMCD_Data to SUPERHOTMCD_Data it works, but the mouse aim is a little off, and makes it difficult to play.
title: SUPERHOT: MIND CONTROL DELETE
